name: Set Up Us the Bomb (25 player)
descr: Defeat Mimiron without anyone in the raid being hit by the following in 25-player mode.
tooltip:
Set Up Us the Bomb (25 player)

Defeat Mimiron without anyone in the raid being hit by the following in 25-player mode.

Criteria:
- A Proximity Mine
- A Bomb Bot
- A Rocket Strike
